blocks.page_title: Introduction Section - Participant Confirmation

title.text: Are you completing the questions on behalf of {first_name}?

description: For example, you are a parent or guardian completing the questions for a child.

blocks.page_title: Introduction Section - Completing for someone else

question.title: There has been a problem accessing the survey

description.text:
This questionnaire is intended for {first_name}. You have indicated that you are not {first_name} or completing the questionnaire on behalf of them.

If this is correct, please:

1.Tick the continue box and then select “Save and continue”.

2.On the next page, select the “Submit” button to submit the questionnaire.

3.Call the helpline on 0808 196 1270. You will need your Participant ID. You can find your participant ID in your window notification email. The survey team member on the phone will tell you what to do next.

If you are {first_name}, or completing the questions on behalf of them:

1.Select “< Previous” two times. You can find this at the top left-hand side of this page, underneath the blue banner that says "Winter CIS - follow-up questionnaire".

2.You will then need to amend the answers to be able to complete the survey.

blocks.page_title: Introduction Section - Access error message
Intro

contents.description: This section will ask about all your follow-up lateral flow test results.
Please take a lateral flow test every other day until you have two negative test results in a row.
Only move onto the symptoms section after you have entered all your follow-up lateral flow test results.

description.text: Note, throughout this questionnaire "you" refers to {first_name}.

contents.description: What do we mean by "every other day"? Day 1 - positive test. Repeat lateral flow tests on day 3, day 5, day 7, day 9... Stop testing when you test negative two times in a row.

question.title: Have you successfully taken your first follow-up lateral flow test?
description:
If you are planning to take your test but have not yet done so, please exit the questionnaire and return when you have taken it.

If the test result was void, please take another test.

options.label: No - I have run out of useable lateral flow tests
options.value: No - I have run out of useable lateral flow tests

blocks.page_title: First lateral lateral flow test taken - Winter CIS follow-up

in: No - I have run out of useable lateral flow tests

question.title: On which date did you take your first follow-up lateral flow test?

blocks.page_title: First lateral flow test date taken - Winter CIS follow-up

question.title: Did you have any symptoms on the day you took your first follow-up lateral flow test, that you thought were caused or made worse by the COVID-19 infection?
description:
Please select an answer even if this test result was negative.

We will ask you to tell us what these symptoms were after you have entered all your follow-up lateral flow test results in this questionnaire.

blocks.page_title: First lateral flow test symptoms - Winter CIS follow-up

question.title: What was the result of your first follow-up lateral flow test?

blocks.page_title: First lateral flow test result - Winter CIS follow-up

question.title: Thank you for letting us know about your first follow-up lateral flow test

description.text:
Please keep testing until you have two negative test results in a row.

- To report your next follow-up lateral flow test result, please select "Report next test result"

- If you have not taken your next lateral flow test yet, please exit the questionnaire using "Save and exit survey" at the top of this page. You will return to this page when you next access the questionnaire to enter your next test result.

Only select "Continue to symptoms section" if your testing window is closing or you have run out of lateral flow tests. Once you move onto the symptoms section, you cannot enter any more follow-up lateral flow test results in this questionnaire.

Your testing window closing date for this follow-up questionnaire is {window_close_date}.

options.label: Continue to symptoms section
options.description: if you have run out of tests or your testing window is closing

blocks.page_title: First follow-up lateral flow test thank you - Winter CIS follow-up

question.title: Thank you, you have now finished the questions about all your follow-up lateral flow tests
description:
Once you move onto the symptoms questions, you will not be able to return to this section to enter more follow-up lateral flow test results.

If you need to enter another follow-up lateral flow test result, please click on "previous" at the top left of this page.

If you have entered all your follow-up lateral flow test results, please click continue to move onto the symptoms section.

blocks.page_title: Lateral Flow Tests end - Winter CIS follow-up
Your symptoms - Winter CIS follow-up

description.text: Remember, in the following questions "you" refers to {first_name}.

question.title: Have you had any of the following symptoms as part of your most recent COVID-19 infection?
description:
Select the symptoms you thought were caused or made worse by the COVID-19 infection you had.

You will be asked about other symptoms on the next page.

options.label: Loss of appetite or eating less than usual
options.value: Loss of appetite or eating less than usual

blocks.page_title: Symptoms first question - Winter CIS follow-up

question.title: Have you had any of these other symptoms as part of your most recent COVID-19 infection?
description: Select the symptoms you thought were caused or made worse by the COVID-19 infection you had.

options.label: Low mood or not enjoying anything
options.value: Low mood or not enjoying anything

blocks.page_title: Symptoms second question - Winter CIS follow-up

question.title: Did you take any medicine for your most recent COVID-19 infection?

options.label: I took prescribed antiviral or antibody treatments for COVID-19
options.value: I took prescribed antiviral or antibody treatments for COVID-19

options.label: I took another medicine prescribed to treat my symptoms
options.value: I took another medicine prescribed to treat my symptoms

options.label: I took non-prescription medication
options.description: For example medicine you can buy over the counter from a shop or chemist

options.label: I did not take any medicine
options.value: I did not take any medicine

blocks.page_title: Medicine for COVID-19 infection - Winter CIS follow-up

question.title: Thank you, please continue to the next page to submit your questionnaire

description.text:
This is the end of your questionnaire. Thank you very much for taking part.

Your testing window closing date for this follow-up questionnaire is {window_close_date}.

guidance.show_guidance: If you have not entered two negative lateral flow test results
guidance.hide_guidance: If you have not entered two negative lateral flow test results

contents.description: If you have not had two negative lateral flow test results yet, and
- you still have useable lateral flow tests, and
- your follow up testing window is not closing yet

Continue to test every other day until you have two negative test results in a row, and wait for your follow-up reminder email. This will include a new access code. Use this to enter all your follow-up lateral flow test results and to complete and submit the follow-up questionnaire.

blocks.page_title: End page - Winter CIS follow-up

contents.description: If another household member wants to start their questionnaire using the same device
You will need to click the "leave this page" link below.
They will then need to log in using their unique 16 character access code in the email or letter they were sent.

submission.title: Submit your questionnaire
submission.warning: You cannot view your answers after submission
